game.name: DreamVision Studio
game.categories: Single-player, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "DreamVision Studio" is a Studio/World maker for content creators in real time that uses the webcam to generate an avatar that can interact with the customizable world. Its the definitive content creation playground that can be used as a tool.
